DD::Image::Private::Memory::ObserverI Struct Referenceabstract

Inherited by DD::Image::Private::Memory::ScopedObserverI.

Public Member Functions

virtual void callback (const Event event)=0
 

Detailed Description

The observer base, to receive callbacks:

  • inherit from this struct
  • add to the ObserverManager (see also ScopedObserverI)
  • implement the callback
